bibl.title: More Penthemeros certificates from Karanis
bibl.seg: 141.4 P. Col. Inv. 133 P. Mich. Inv. 2409; 6819a; Inv. Case 20, No. 115 P. Yale Inv. 969 145.4 P. Louvre I, 31
W. Graham Claytor, More Penthemeros Certificates from Karanis.

Six certificates found clandestinely and sold through the antiquities market between the early 1920s and 1935. - 1-2. P. Col. Inv. 133. Karanis, 54/55 CE. - 3. P.CtYBR [= P. Yale] Inv. 969. Karanis, 93/94 CE. - 4. P. Mich. Inv. 6819a. Karanis, 94/95 CE. - 5. P. Mich. Inv. 2409. Karanis, 19 June 140 CE. - 6. P. Mich. Inv. Case 20, No. 115. Karanis, 7 June 193 CE. - Pp. 95-100: Appendix 1: Penthemeros Certificates on Papyrus from Karanis [Nos 1-43]; - 100-102: Appendix 2: P.Louvre 1.31 and the Corpus of Later Penthemeros Certificates.
bibl.note: Six certificates found clandestinely and sold through the antiquities market between the early 1920s and 1935. - 1-2. P. Col. Inv. 133. Karanis, 54/55 CE. - 3. P.CtYBR [= P.
